      • move

        void move(long time,
        double price)
        Moves first point of the object to the new position dragging whole object with all other points. Do not initiate chart repaint immediately, use IChart.repaint() method if necessary.
        Specified by:
        move in interface IChartObject
        Parameters:
        time - new time of the first point
        price - new price of the first point

      • isStickToCandleTimeEnabled

        boolean isStickToCandleTimeEnabled()
        Returns stick to candle/bar time option state on X axis while drawing. Actual only for uniform periods. System default value: true

        Sets stick to candle/bar time option. Actual only for uniform periods. System default value: true
